Class DefaultCopier

java.lang.Object

                              lu.uni.geko.util.ecore.AbstractDeferringManuallyReferencingRecursivePkgVariantCopier
                                  lu.uni.geko.weaver.copy.DefaultCopier
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject>, Copier
public class DefaultCopier
extends AbstractDeferringManuallyReferencingRecursivePkgVariantCopier
implements Copier

The default implementation of the interface Copier that is responsible for creating base elements corresponding to existing advice elements for the CopierFactoryExt extension point.

It currently implements the global and per join point advice instantiation scope.

To copy the elements it uses a AbstractDeferringManuallyReferencingRecursivePkgVariantCopier which is a modified version of EcoreUtil.Copier.

See Also:
Copier, AbstractDeferringManuallyReferencingRecursivePkgVariantCopier, Serialized Form
